DOC.brief_summary: It is the study aim to investigate the effect of glp-2 on blood flow in humans. we wish to study eventual changes in renal blood flow, carotic blood flow and cardiac out put. GLP-2 will be administered subcutaneously, and the effect monitored by doppler ultra sound scannings and cotinuesly measuring of cardiac out put and blood pressure. The study will include 15 healhty volunteers, 10 wil receive 450 nmol GLP-2 and 5 will receive 1 ml of isotonic saline (as baseline reference).
DOC.criteria: Age 2060 Healthy No medication Not pregnant All of the persons not meeting the abowe mentioned criteria
